msg_leave_group:
基于Term of Service, OPBot: {botid} 
Leaves the group: {groupid}
msg_leave_msg: According to Term of Service, this Bot cannot provide services to the group. For more information, please check the project usage agreement.

*.msg_challenge_not_for_you: This verification is not for you
*.msg_challenge_passed:
You have passed the verification, welcome to join the group! 
If you still cannot speak, please restart the Telegram client.
*.msg_challenge_failed: Sorry, you did not pass the verification. If you need to unblock, please chat with the group management.
*.msg_bot_no_permission: The operation failed, it may be that the group manager did not grant the robot administrator authority.
*.msg_approved: You have been manually approved by the administrator {user}, welcome to join this group!
*.msg_refused: This user has been removed from the group by the administrator {user}.
